keyEvents.description: Vivi discovers the bomb inside the clock tower, guarded by Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day
keyEvents.significance: The location where Crocodile's bomb was hidden to destroy Alubarna

keyEvents.description: Vivi defeats Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day at the clock tower but cannot disable the bomb
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the desperate situation requiring Pell's sacrifice

keyEvents.description: Pell arrives at the clock tower, grabs the bomb, and flies it into the sky
keyEvents.significance: The starting point of Pell's heroic sacrifice to save Arabasta

description: A tall clock tower in the center of Alubarna where Crocodile hid his bomb with a 5-kilometer blast radius. The tower served as the hiding place for the explosive device meant to destroy the capital during the climax of the civil war.
culturalSignificance: Central landmark of Alubarna and the site of one of the most dramatic moments in the Arabasta Arc.

keyEvents.description: Zoro takes a hit from Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day to protect Vivi and Chopper as they race to the clock tower
keyEvents.significance: Shows the desperate battle happening throughout Alubarna to stop the bomb

keyEvents.description: The bomb explodes high in the sky above Alubarna, saving the city and its inhabitants
keyEvents.significance: The entire city is saved from destruction thanks to Pell's sacrifice

keyEvents.description: Tashigi and Marines fight Baroque Works agents throughout Alubarna
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ongoing conflict between Marines and Baroque Works in the capital

description: The capital city of the Arabasta Kingdom where the climactic battles of the arc take place. The city was threatened by a massive bomb planted by Baroque Works that would have destroyed everything within a 5-kilometer radius.
culturalSignificance: The political and cultural center of Arabasta, home to the royal palace and where the fate of the kingdom was decided.

keyEvents.description: Luffy continues his battle with Crocodile inside the palace, getting poisoned by Crocodile's hook
keyEvents.significance: The site of the final confrontation between Luffy and Crocodile

description: The royal palace of Arabasta located in Alubarna where Luffy confronts Crocodile in their climactic battle. The palace serves as the backdrop for the final showdown between the protagonist and the arc's main antagonist.
culturalSignificance: Seat of power for the Nefertari royal family and the location where Crocodile's plans are ultimately thwarted.
